name: Brake Bleeder Kit Automatic 7~36PSI Electric Brake Fluid Bleeder 1.6L/min Flow Airless Vacuum Filling, Adjustable Brake Pressure Bleeder Pump with 3 Master Cylinder Adapter, Fluid Shortage Protection
short_description: 1.【Professional Electric Brake Bleeder Kit】The brake bleeder kit is designed specifically for efficient filling and draining of brake fluid, making it an essential tool for any automotive enthusiast. With its advanced technology, our electric brake bleeder ensures minimal air bubble formation and prevents water absorption during the process, providing a superior alternative to traditional brake bleeding methods.

2.【Fully Automatic & Time-Saving Brake Bleeder】Simply press the start button and the brake pressure bleeder will automatically change the fluid. Change the brake fluid with one click, eliminating the need to drain the fluid manually or by pressing the brake pedal. One person can easily complete the brake fluid replacement in just 4-10 minutes. It saves over 50% of operation time compared to traditional brake fluid change methods.

3.【Pulse Filling Without Bubbles】 The brake bleeder kit uses pulse filling to precisely control pressure and flow. The brake pressure bleeder kit fills the brake fluid in a stable and even manner, preventing air from mixing into the brake fluid and forming bubbles. No external vacuum pump needed.

4.【Adjustable Pressure & Flow Control】You can precisely control the flow of brake fluid by adjusting the pressure with the knob, and you can also read the pressure value intuitively through the pressure gauge. You can customize the machine's working pressure based on the specific requirements of your vehicle. Working pressure range: 0.5–2.5 bar/7–36 PSI. Max power: 35W. Max output flow: 1.6L/min.

5.【3 Adapters for Wide Application】Our brake bleeder kit comes with 3 adapters for wide use. Compatible for Tesla, Toyota Series, Mercedes-Benz, FIAT, compatible for Audi, BMW, VW, Skoda, Volvo, compatible for Land Rover, Jaguar, Bentley, Porsche, Buick, compatible for Chevrolet, Ford, Citroen, PEUGEOT , Chery, compatible for Mazda, Renault, Geely, Lexus, Cadillac, compatible for BYD, Changan, Roewe, ZHONGHUA, Great Wall Motor, MG, etc.

6.【Brake Fluid Shortage Protection】The brake bleeder kit has a built-in pressure monitoring device that monitors the fluid level in the new brake fluid bottle in real time. If the new bottle is almost empty, the machine will automatically stop filling to prevent air from entering the brake system.

7.【Excellent Sealing & Corrosion-Resistant】The oil recovery bottle, internal piping, filling pipes, and connecting fittings are made of premium materials with excellent corrosion resistance. They withstand long-term contact with brake fluid without any corrosion, providing a longer service life. New and used oil pipes are designed separately. Precision-machined metal joints have excellent sealing performance and effectively prevent brake fluid leakage and air ingress.

8.【3-Year Warranty & CE/ROHS Certification】Our brake bleeder kit is CE and ROHS certified, guaranteeing its quality and safety for professional use. We aim at trying our best to offer you the best product and services to make you unworried before/after the purchase. We promise a 3-year warranty. If you have any questions or doubts, our professional technical team will help you solve the problem asap.
